message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $125.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $130.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm thinking $127.50 is a fair price for this product.
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I can meet you halfway again. I'll offer you the product for $129.
I think we're getting close, Alice! I'm willing to meet you at $128. I really want to make this deal happen, but I need to stay within my budget.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer you the product for $129.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm afraid I need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. This is my final offer.
